howto.info: This is a comment section, it will be used to explain the format of the file
This file should always be wellformed XML, you can validate it here:
Tags should always be enclosed by a CDATA block.
Markup is available using the following tags:
@newline@ will put a linebreak at that position
@bold@ can be used as a bold tag
The id attribute *must* correspond to the actual placement of the tag
subsection names are inbetween <head> tags, the <a> tag is used for answers
